hero.description: A good place for children, an oasis of knowledge and creativity, a space where children's voices are heard.

about.title: About Sunny Land Kids
about.description1: Sunny Land Kids is an after-school playground and care center where creativity and knowledge come to life. We provide a safe and stimulating environment for children, combining education with fun.
about.description2: Our mission is to create an oasis of knowledge and creativity, a space where children's voices are heard and they are encouraged to develop their talents.

afterschool.title: Before & Afterschool
afterschool.description: Care and educational activities before and after school.

workshops.title: Recreational Workshops
workshops.description: Painting, reading, theater, cinema - for creative development.

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: A safe and fun space for play.

reading.title: Reading
reading.description: Journeys into the world of books.
